title: Boutique Cape Tribulation Hideaway near the Great Barrier Reef & Daintree Rainforest
description:
Experience the magical place where the Great Barrier Reef meets the Daintree Rainforest - the only place in the world where two UNESCO World Heritage-listed sites come together - at mist at Cape Tribulation, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Succumb to the unique beauty of this spectacular eight-acre destination nestled in Queensland's tropics, less than a three-hour drive from Cairns and just a 30-metre stroll from the world's oldest rainforest.

By day, unwind and reconnect with nature among the lush jungle canopy and freshwater creek, stop in the small orchard, where, when in season, tropical fruits are free to pick, settle on the decking and watch the fireflies play, or sink into one of the property's double hammocks and listen out for the calls of the lesser sooty owl. By night, retire to your luxe, freestanding self-contained pavilion with a fully equipped kitchenette, surrounded by rare palm trees, resident sunbirds and magnificent views. For the more adventurous spirits, make the most of nature on your doorstep with a range of incredible activities: snorkel through the colourful underwater paradise of the Great Barrier Reef, arrange a guided walk through the rainforest or ride along the endless stretch of sand on an unforgettable horseback adventure (surcharges apply).
offer_address: 94 Nicole Drive, Cape Tribulation, Queensland 4873, Australia

title: Boutique Daintree Rainforest Escape near the Great Barrier Reef with Dining Credit & Welcome Wine
description:
Escape the everyday at this eight-acre sanctuary where the Great Barrier Reef meets Daintree Rainforest - the world's only intersection of two UNESCO World Heritage sites. This spectacular tropical retreat sits just 30 metres from the world's oldest living rainforest and less than three hours drive from Cairns.

Your deluxe, self-contained pavilion comes complete with a fully equipped kitchenette and is surrounded by native palms and resident sunbirds. By day, explore the property's lush jungle canopy, freshwater creek and small orchard with seasonal tropical fruits. Watch fireflies from the deck or relax in double hammocks while listening for lesser sooty owls.

Nature's wonders are at your doorstep with endless adventures awaiting. Snorkel the colourful underwater paradise of the Great Barrier Reef, join guided walks through the ancient rainforest, or experience an unforgettable horseback ride along pristine beaches (surcharges apply).
offer_address: 94 Nicole Drive, Cape Tribulation, Queensland 4873, Australia

title: Boutique Cape Tribulation Retreat
description: Your boutique rainforest retreat awaits in Cape Tribulation, where the ancient Daintree Rainforest meets the awe-inspiring Great Barrier Reef - the only place in the world where two UNESCO World Heritage-listed sites collide. Experience the magic at Mist at Cape Tribulation, an ultra-luxe collection of boutique pavilions that offers an unhurried, last-minute break like no other. Get off the grid and embrace eco-sustainable luxury with solar power and the glittering stars above illuminating your evenings, and the dappled sunshine of the rainforest lighting up your days.
offer_address: 94 Nicole Drive, Cape Tribulation, Queensland 4873, Australia

title: Boutique Daintree Rainforest Retreat
description:
Experience the magic of Queenslandâ€™s UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest at the blissfully secluded Daintree Ecolodge. Surrounded by some of the rarest flora and fauna in the worldâ€™s oldest living rainforest, this boutique lodge invites you to reconnect with nature as you embark on dedicated walks to a pristine waterfall, revitalise the senses with spa treatments at Daintree Wellness Spa and dine in a breathtaking rainforest setting on seasonal, locally-sourced produce.

With no TV or Wi-Fi available and accommodating just 30 guests in 15 eco-friendly bayans (treehouses) at any one time, Daintree Ecolodge affords the unique opportunity to admire your surroundings from above, set high above the rainforest canopy, and experience a pure, secluded landscape where time seems to standstill.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Daily Ã¡ la carte breakfast at Julaymba Restaurant & Bar
- A$50 spa voucher per person at Daintree Wellness Spa (See the 'Fine Print' for details)
- Daily cocktail per person, per evening, at Julaymba Restaurant & Bar

title: Boutique Eco-Luxury in Tropical North Queensland's Daintree Rainforest with Onsite Waterfall
description: Deep within the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest lies Daintree Ecolodge, a rainforest hideaway for the nature lover. This treehouse-styled retreat comes plush with an onsite waterfall, accessed via a self-guided stroll or through the lodge's magical 'A Walk Through Time' experience. Enjoy breakfast and dinner at the Julaymba Restaurant & Bar or opt for an intimate six-course degustation meal on a private pontoon at the edge of a lagoon with 'Dining in the Rainforest'.
